entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:36 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -31.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 08:13 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

Temperature: -31.5°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: E 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 36 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 36 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 55 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 08:03 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 08:03 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
